 Guoledart and Neptune had finished the outward
skeeleton. Mech fluid sweat falling from thier faces.
"Okay lets keep going." They started working weary of
the hour.
--- Yanshosh@... wrote:
> ::Shredder::
> 
> Shredder nods. "I'll try to report periodically. If
> I can't find
> anything, I'll come back as soon as I'm sure there's
> no one around."
> 
> He walks off toward the exit, makes sure that all
> his useful devices
> were with him, and then exits, flying off toward the
> old location of
> the Predacon base.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., t882hcc91@y... wrote:
> > Magmatron:
> > 
> >      "Then please do that," Magmatron said. He
> hoped to gain some new 
> > recruits from this. "Guiledart, get to work on the
> reprogramming 
> > device, I want it on my desk tomorrow."
> 
>
